author: ajith
msg: Fixed the messsage ID(relates to) problem. The reason for that is the client not sending the message id. Now the system is configured to send the msg id all the time

author: jayachandra
msg: extractAttachmentNodes() method of SOAPConnectionImpl should be calling getChildren() inside it rather than getChildElements() or else OMText nodes won't be retrieved into the iterator.

author: crossley
msg: Declare the LogTransformer to assist with debugging.
